title: thillaana (naadhiru dhiru dheemta)
sahitya:
nAdiru diru dhImta dirana taretAni nAdiru diru tonm diru diru

tAnA tiyyanare tom tillAna 

(nAdiru)



anupallavi



ditlAm takadhIm takajham kiTataka tattillAna tana tiyyanare

tana tiyyanarae tananana

taka dhimi takajhaNu taNatari kiTataka tattillAna tanadirana

dhImta tadhingiNatOm 

(nAdiru)



caraNam



nIrajKSi ninnu kOriyunna dhIra niratamu dalaci dalaci cAla

marulu kona mA lalanA maNi ninnu karuNinci kalayuTa kidi manci

samayamu



solkaTTu



tAm dhIm jhaNu takiTa sanidhapama padhapa dhimi takiTa takundari

kiTataka jhaNutaka

dhimitaka rigapama magarisani tadhingiNatom tadhingiNatom

tadhingiNatom 

(nAdiru)
